NexusDatabaseIterator#

A class for iterating over paginated API endpoints, collecting any IteratedType into a python Iterator.

class qnexus.client.pagination_iterator.NexusDatabaseIterator(resource_type: str, nexus_url: str, params: Dict[str, Any], wrapper_method: Callable[[dict[str, Any]], List[IteratedType]])#

Bases: Generic[IteratedType], Iterator[IteratedType]

An object that can be used to summarize or iterate through a filter query made to the Nexus database.

all(refresh: bool = False) → RefList[IteratedType]#

Collapse into RefList. Pass refresh to refresh the data.

count() → int#

Count the items that match the filter.

handle_errors(res: Response) → None#
summarize() → DataFrame#

Summarize in a pandas DataFrame.
